name: Nine Lives Foundation
description: Accepts donations of pet supplies, bedding, and cat-related items to support cat rescue and adoption programs
fullDescription: Nine Lives Foundation accepts donations of pet supplies and cat-related items to support their cat rescue, rehabilitation, and adoption programs in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept pet supply donations
- Accept bedding and blankets
- Accept cat-related items
- Support cat rescue programs
- Support adoption services
- Items help rescued cats
howToGetIt:
1. Check donation wish list
2. Gather cat supplies to donate
3. Drop off at shelter location
4. Or arrange delivery
5. Support rescued cats
6. Consider adopting a cat
keywords: Nine Lives Foundation, cat rescue, cat adoption, pet supplies donation, blankets donation, San Mateo, animal shelter, feline rescue, cat rehabilitation
